creator: Maksim Kolosov
descriptionHtml:
The MAXIMSCHOOL chess school presents the app "Luring under a knight fork".

The free version contains 17 interesting exercises on gaining an advantage, winning pieces, victory combinations. In the full version of the application, 142 tasks are waiting for you.

This application contains tactical chess puzzles in which the enemy is lured under the knight's fork.

Author of the idea, selection of exercises: Maksim Kuksov (MAXIMSCHOOL.RU).
descriptionShort: Exercises for tactical vigilance, beautiful combinations

title: Knight forks Lite

creator: Maksim Kolosov
descriptionHtml:
Chess is a great mind trainer! Studying chess is the development of thinking, an increase in the level of intelligence, the formation of character.

Teaching chess to children and adults helps to educate and form creative individuals with a high level of IQ, who are able to make flexible non-standard decisions and endure life's difficulties.

If self-education is an important part of your life, and chess is one of your hobbies, then the MaximSchool chess school does an excellent and useful job, selecting interesting tactical puzzles and chess games that provide a unique opportunity to study chess openings, middlegame playing ideas, strategy and tactics!

The free version of the app "Luring under a knight fork" contains 17 interesting exercises on gaining an advantage, winning pieces, victory combinations. In the full version of the application, 142 tasks are waiting for you. This application contains tactical chess puzzles in which the enemy is lured under the knight's fork.

Author of the idea, selection of exercises: Maksim Kuksov (MAXIMSCHOOL.RU).
descriptionShort: Exercises for tactical vigilance, beautiful combinations
